Description of incident: NCO Financial Systems Inc. informed customers of a data breach when their third party communication vendor, RevSpring, Inc. sent an email to a number of loan customers that mistakenly included an attachment that contained loan statements. The information on these statements included names, addresses, Social Security numbers, and account numbers.The company is offering 12 months free of ProtectMyID through Experian.
